entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
